example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ايام) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرئيس) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العراقي)) (NP (NOUN_PROP صدام) (NOUN_PROP حسين)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS باتت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC معدودة)))))))

arg.g: it (days of Iraqi President Saddam Hussein)
